product_name: Nite Ize Wraplit LED Utility Light
long_description: The Nite Ize Wraplit LED utility light beams focused, bright light into remote, hard-to-access places and perches on a flexible and versatile Gear Tie base. Encased in durable polycarbonate plastic housing, the battery-powered light has 4 functions: high power, low power, strobe and signal. White LED has an effective range of up to 50 ft. and 1-mi. visibility. Strong, bendable wire Gear Tie base features a sturdy rubber exterior and can be configured at either end to position the light at almost any angle imaginable. Loop to hang, twist to attach, bend to prop-even wear it around your neck for hands-free illumination, precisely where you need it. The Nite Ize Wraplit LED utility light runs on 2 lithium 3V batteries that are easy to replace.
short_description: The Nite Ize Wraplit LED utility light beams focused, bright light into remote, hard-to-access places and perches on a flexible and versatile Gear Tie base.
